text: James Alexander Murray (9 November 1864 in Moncton, New Brunswick – 16 February 1960) was a Conservative politician and the 16th Premier of New Brunswick. Murray was first elected to the legislature in 1908 and served as Minister of Agriculture before becoming Premier in 1917 only to have his government defeated in the general election weeks later. ==External links== *Government of New Brunswick biography Category:1864 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Leaders of the Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick Category:People from Moncton Category:Premiers of New Brunswick
title: James Alexander Murray
